title: Rize and MX Partner to Provide Fintechs and Neobanks with Embedded Finance for Better Data Insights and Banking Capabilities - PRNewswire

description: /PRNewswire/ -- MX, the financial data platform and leader in modern connectivity, today announced a partnership with Rize, an embedded banking platform, to...
